Text.Page: Elleon was looking for <PCNAME> before he set off to search for the villagers.
While Elleon searched for the villagers, <PCNAME> investigated the Crystal Mine to search for Amarre.

Vogzu and Free Exodor...

We're lucky we ran into them. They'll be great help for sure.

I wish I could go with you, , but I'm worried that Rogash might harm our people.

I'll gather more information from Vogzu and go later. , you go with Jelena and inform our troops outside.

Elleon went alone? Looks like he wants to make his move first after getting information from Vogzu.

But Elleon alone..."Is there something wrong?"

No, it's nothing. We should hurry.

I think the base exit is over there. Let's go and look for Titus and Amarre.
I never thought I'd make a friend here. Especially a naga friend. Ha ha.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Wait. I hear something."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I heard it too. <PCNAME>! That was an emergency flare!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"That means..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Someone's in trouble! Let's go!

Follow me! Quick!

! Jelena! Lucky that you two heard the flare. These nagas just don't give up.

But I knew that you would notice my flare."What happened?"

Titus and Aurl found a camp for our people.

I thought I would be safe since I was near the camp, but the nagas got me off guard so I had to run. But I found something interesting! Come and see.

Oh, okay. Jelena's heading for the camp?

, come and I'll show you the Crystal Mine.

Quick, before the nagas give us any more trouble.

! Over here!

There are so many crystals here. I saw the nagas come and carry off the crystals.

I wonder why the nagas are collecting the crystals.

If you can help me out investigating the crystals, we might figure something out about Exodor.

Hmm...the blue crystals are different secretions of the butterflies.

To be exact, they've been ruminated.

This must be one of their dietary activities...but why in the world would the nagas collect it?

Why?"What should we do next?"

I think it's quite obvious why the butterflies ruminate.

But what I have to find out is why the nagas are collecting those crystals.

Where are they taking the crystals to?

Let's discuss this with Elleon first.
That's not enough. We still need more samples.
